# toMapRect()

**Instance Method**

Returns the map rectangle that corresponds to the calling coordinate region.

## Declaration

```swift
toMapRect(): MapRect;
```

## Return Value

A [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/MapRect] that corresponds to the calling [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/CoordinateRegion].

## Comparing, copying, and converting regions

- **copy()**: Returns a copy of the calling coordinate region.
- **equals(anotherRegion)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two regions are equal.
- **toBoundingRegion()**: Returns the bounding region that corresponds to the specified coordinate region.
